duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure financial statement accuracy and compliance by collaborating with the VP of Accounting.
Reconcile accounts, bank statements, and perform month-end close process.
Prepare and verify journal entries for the general ledger.
Support the annual audit and budgeting process.
Oversee concert budget, settlements, reconciliation, and reporting.
Maintain financial aspects of the fixed asset system.
Study trends and support ROI evaluation for organizational growth.
Participate in prayer and Christian bible studies to embrace the faith-driven culture.
Assist with special projects and travel as needed for conferences and seminars.
